Text.val: Author: Bujakowski Grzegorz
17.11.2014 GB SCR19314 Button Approve All: Added test if there is a row in DCBA for SFER_ERRORCODE = 29
04.11.2014 SH SCR19291 Button Approve: Changed test "No ING grid entered" to "Bankaccount not approved yet" (no longer tested on
DHIC, now tested on DCBA)
27.10.2014 GB SCR19265 Button Approve all: fixed problem with working this button
11.09.2014 GB SCR19119 Extended condition for color def. for 4.8 Difference
02.09.2014 GB SCR19119 Button Approve: extended test for update SFER/SFEX rows
02.09.2014 GB SCR19118 Button Approve all: change SFER_ERRORCODE > 10 in SFER_ERRORCODE >= 10
22.08.2014 GB SCR19090 Added GB902 calculation for V.BUYERGROUPINVESTMENT
11.08.2014 GB SCR19058 Added button Approve all
07.01.2014 GB SCR18620 Chnaged calcualtion for V.INVESTMENTACCCH

03.01.2014 GB SCR18620 Chnaged calcualtion for V.INVESTMENTACCCH
18.12.2013 GB SCR18585 Added button Retry
11.12.2013 GB SCR18579 Button Approve: Fixed problem with Max(INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_SCHEDULEDATE) + V.NUMBEROFDAYS < GNRL_ACTIVADA
27.06.2013 JH SCR18234 Approve/Reject added V.NUMBEROFDAYS and task UpdateNumberOfDaysFromSBUY
15.05.2013 GB SCR18136 Button Approve: changed where clause for calculation the V.TOOOLD
13.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
29.11.2012 SH SCR17743 Button Approve: Changed test SFER_ERRORCODE between 1 and 10 into between 1 and 9
12.11.2012 GB SCR17667 Set mouse busy/Set mouse normal
05.11.2012 GB SCR17667 Changed test for allow enabled for the button Approve
28.06.2012 GB SCR17400 Changed test for allow enabled for the button Approve (see rct.SFER(bt.Approve))
16.04.2012 SH SCR17245 Changed calc of V.SUPPLIERINVESTMENT / V.SUPPLIERLIMIT (now done via BDC151)
29.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
22.03.2012 SH SCR17149 Changed calc of columns 10.7/10.9 (Fees (Citadel)/Fees (Factorlink))
18.11.2011 GB SCR16911 Added the Documents
16.11.2011 SH SCR16836 Button View: OSF490 is now called
02.11.2011 GB SCR16837 Added the Calculations
20.09.2011 GB SCR16744 Changed value of Supplier/Currency
28.04.2011 SH SCR16431 Replaced GB002 by GB902
10.01.2011 GB SCR15996 Added more changes (see SCR)

03.11.2010 GB SCR15938 Changed selection for task when errors are displayed
31.10.2010 GB SCR15938 Added the button Next
22.10.2010 GB SCR15900 Changed calculation for screen values
(V.SUPPLIERDIFFERENCE, V.BUYERDIFFERENCE)
Pushbutton handling
Pushbutton handling
... set error text for further use
O - Online
B - Buyer
S - Supplier
V - ViewFile
C - Calculations
T - Documents
A - Approve
L - Approve all
R - Reject
Y - Retry
N - Next
E - Exit

SQL_STMT_U.val: select distinct a.SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER, a.SFEX_SUPPLIERID from :1/SFEX a where a.SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and a.SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and a.SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and a.SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0 and trim(a.SFEX_SUPPLIERID) || trim(a.SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER) > ':5' order by a.SFEX_SUPPLIERID, a.SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER

select SFER_ERRORCODE, (select max(sfer_sfex_no) from :1/SFER where sfer_sfex_no in (select sfex_no from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO=:2 and SFEX_SUPPLIERID=':3' and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER=':4' and SFEX_ADMNO=:5 and SFEX_CLNTNO=:6)) from :1/SFER where sfer_sfex_no in (select sfex_no from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO=:2 and SFEX_SUPPLIERID=':3' and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER=':4' and SFEX_ADMNO=:5 and SFEX_CLNTNO=:6) group by SFER_ERRORCODE order by SFER_ERRORCODE

Text.val: 1- SFER_HANDLED_DATE1
2 - SFER_HANDLED_TIME1
3 - SFER_HANDLED_DATE2
4 - SFER_HANDLED_TIME2

SQL_STMT_U.val: select SFER_ERRORCODE, (select max(sfer_sfex_no) from :1/SFER where sfer_sfex_no in (select sfex_no from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO=:2 and SFEX_SUPPLIERID=':3' and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER=':4' and SFEX_ADMNO=:5 and SFEX_CLNTNO=:6)) from :1/SFER where sfer_sfex_no in (select sfex_no from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO=:2 and SFEX_SUPPLIERID=':3' and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER=':4' and SFEX_ADMNO=:5 and SFEX_CLNTNO=:6) group by SFER_ERRORCODE order by SFER_ERRORCODE

Text.val: 1- SFER_HANDLED_DATE1
2 - SFER_HANDLED_TIME1
3 - SFER_HANDLED_DATE2
4 - SFER_HANDLED_TIME2

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (SFEX_FULLAMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT + SFEX_DISCOUNTVATAMOUNTDEM + SFEX_COMMISSIONAMOUNTDEM + SFEX_COMMISSIONVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (SFEX_CALCULATEDINTEREST + SFEX_DISCOUNTVATAMOUNTFL + SFEX_COMMISSIONAMOUNTFL + SFEX_COMMISSIONVATAMOUNTFL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER = ':5' and SFEX_SUPPLIERID = ':6' and SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC >0

Text.val: -- Calc V.SUPPLIERINVESTMENT and V.SUPPLIERLIMIT
... check to set V.SUPPLIERLIMIT = 0

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT - SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0 and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER = ':5' and SFEX_SUPPLIERID = ':6'

select cast (sum (SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT - SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0 and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER <> ':5' and not(exists(select * from :1/SFER where (SFER_HANDLED_ACTION1 = 2 or SFER_HANDLED_ACTION2 = 2) and SFER_SFEX_NO = SFEX_NO))

select cast (sum (SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT - SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0 and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER <> ':5' and exists(select * from :1/SFER where (SFER_HANDLED_ACTION1 = 2 or SFER_HANDLED_ACTION2 = 2) and SFER_SFEX_NO = SFEX_NO)
select cast (sum (ACCC_MUTAINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':4' and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95

select cast (sum (CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON where CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON_MONTH = :3 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':4' and (CMON_ADMNO, CMON_CLNTNO) in (select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/CLNT where CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :5 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :6)

Text.val: A - Approve button
B - Reject button
-- Reset variables
-- If there are SFER rows where SFER_HANDLED_USRID1 = blank or
-- SFER_HANDLED_USRID1 = user(0) for the selected SFEX rows then
-- then this is the first handling. (V.HANDLING = 1)
-- Else if there are SFER rows where SFER_HANDLED_USRID1 <> blank and
-- (SFER_HANDLED_USRID2 = blank or SFER_HANDLED_USRID2 = user(0))
-- for the selected SFEX rows then this is the second handling. (V.HANDLING = 2)
-- If there are SFER rows where SFER_HANDLED_USRID1 <> blank and <> user(0) and
-- SFER_HANDLED_USRID2 <> blank and <> user(0)
-- for the selected SFEX rows then handling is finished so give message
-- If there are SFER rows for the selected SFEX rows where SFER_ERRORCODE = 13
-- If there are SFER rows for the selected SFEX rows where SFER_ERRORCODE = 29 and bankaccounts exists to be approved

ExpSyntax.val: 'SFER_HANDLED_USRID1 <> '&ASCIIChr (39)&ASCIIChr (39)&' and SFER_HANDLED_USRID1 <> '&ASCIIChr (39)&User (0)&ASCIIChr (39)&' and SFER_HANDLED_USRID2 <> '&ASCIIChr (39)&ASCIIChr (39)&' and SFER_HANDLED_USRID2 <> '&ASCIIChr (39)&User (0)&ASCIIChr (39)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and (case when INVO_DUEDATE >= INVO_SCHEDULEDATE then INVO_DUEDATE + :5 days else INVO_SCHEDULEDATE + :5 days end) < ':4'

select count(*) from :1/SFEX, :1/SFER where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0 and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER <> ':5' and SFEX_SUPPLIERID = ':6' and SFER_SFEX_NO = SFEX_NO and SFER_HANDLED_ACTION1 = 1 and SFER_HANDLED_ACTION2 = 1

select count(*) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0 and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER = ':5' and SFEX_SUPPLIERID = ':6' and exists(select * from :1/DCBA where DCBA_ADMNO = SFEX_ADMNO and DCBA_CLNTNO = SFEX_CLNTNO and DCBA_DEBC_NO = SFEX_DEBC_NO and DCBA_WAITFORAPPROVAL = 'Y') for fetch only

select cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and (case when INVO_DUEDATE >= INVO_SCHEDULEDATE then INVO_DUEDATE + :5 days else INVO_SCHEDULEDATE + :5 days end) < ':4'

Text.val: -- If there are SFER rows for the selected SFEX rows where SFER_ERRORCODE = 29 and there is a row in DCBA
-- then this row must not be apporved and must be skipped
-- Check if V.HANDLING = 1
-- Check if V.HANDLING = 2
